Sp-L: Goddess Statue Legends (Pixie and Joker)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds: Sp-L: Goddess Statue Legends (Pixie and Joker)
By GoldenBoy on Friday, December 13, 2002 - 06:01 am:

I unlocked Legendary Pixie #18- Valkyrie

Password is 'Valhalla'

1) Bring a Pixie to Promiass (I was master rank
but I assume it will trigger at rank A)

2) go to the Goddess Statue (you must explore)

Coincidentally, my Angel was named Valkyrie.

Addendum: Completing this task seem to open all
the other Legendary Pixies. The Password for
Ayane works for me now.

By Gizmo the Lemur on Friday, December 13, 2002 - 08:42 am:

Great job, GoldenBoy! I am glad you got Valkyrie.

By GoldenBoy on Wednesday, December 18, 2002 - 11:33 pm:

Actually it' s Karnab, in one of the funniest
events I've seen. Here's how you get him:

1) Raise a Joker to class A (I used Enma)
2) Bring him to the Goddess Statue (you must explore)
3) The event will give you the password MAD_DOC

I sense a trend in the Goddess statue...

By Thorr on Thursday, December 19, 2002 - 05:01 pm:

I think the goddess statue only works for the Pixie and Joker. If I remember the events right, the pixie event talks about the daughter of Light. Then, the Joker event says that In the light, there is darkness. The Pixie is the angelis light and the Joker is the demonic darkness. Unless there are other relationship they wrote into this, I think it ends there.

-Thorr

By GoldenBoy on Thursday, January 30, 2003 - 07:16 pm:

Further information: You must unlock Pixie, then Joker. People have had no luck going after Joker first.
